articles.description: Watch Hearts v Rosenborg and follow live radio and text coverage as the hosts seek to overturn a 2-1 deficit to reach the Europa Conference League play-offs.
articles.title: Watch: Hearts host Rosenborg in Conference League (agg 1-2)

articles.description: Hibernian take a 3-1 lead to Luzern for their Europa Conference League third qualifying round decider.
articles.title: Europa Conference League: Luzern v Hibernian (agg 1-3)

articles.description: Chief executive Mark Bullingham says the Football Association wants England manager Sarina Wiegman to remain in charge "for a very long time".
articles.title: Wiegman approaches would be '100% rejected' - FA

articles.description: Phil Salt hits a stunning 86 from 32 balls as Manchester Originals beat Trent Rockets to boost their chances of reaching The Hundred knockout stages.
articles.title: Salt hits 86 from 32 balls to set up Originals win

articles.description: Watch Stefanos Tsitsipas stop play during the second round of the Cincinnati Open as he alleges a spectator was making bee sounds.
articles.title: Tsitsipas stops play because of bee sounds from crowd

articles.description: Ireland coach Andy Farrell describes the controversy over son Owen's current disciplinary process as a "circus" that is "absolutely disgusting".
articles.title: Farrell defends son Owen after 'disgusting circus'

articles.description: England midfielder Keira Walsh says Ella Toone needs to be given more "respect" for helping the Lionesses reach the Women's World Cup final.
articles.title: England's Toone deserves more 'respect' - Walsh

articles.description: Live coverage as Derry City aim to overturn Tobol's 1-0 lead from the first leg in the third qualifying round Europa Conference League tie.
articles.title: Listen: Europa Conference League - Derry lead at home to Tobol

articles.description: Watch some of the stranger moments from the 2022-23 Premier League season, including clips from Liverpool manager Jurgen Klopp and Manchester City striker Erling Haaland.
articles.title: Weirdest Premier League moments of last season

articles.description: UK Anti-Doping and the British Boxing Board of Control appeal against the National Anti-Doping Panel's ruling to lift Conor Benn's boxing suspension.
articles.title: Ukad appeals against Benn doping ruling
